title: Determine overall K from K1 Ka and Kw - LaCO3+

content.question:
Based on the information above, which of the following expressions represents the equilibrium constant, K, for the reaction represented by the equation below?

La3+ + CO32− ⇄ LaCO3+

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
